snippet: By forgoing Congress’s assent, he exceeds George W. Bush in imperial hubris.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Prof Bruce Ackerman contends that Pres Obama's declaration of war against Islamic State in Iraq and Syria without congressional consent marks decisive break in American constitutional tradition; maintains it is preposterous that administration is relying on 13-year-old authorization of military force against Al Qaeda for its current actions; warns that Obama is exceeding George W Bush in imperial hubris and betraying the Constitution.
lead_paragraph: By forgoing Congress’s assent, he exceeds George W. Bush in imperial hubris.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
